responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "7823B4F54C5EB4907CA9559DE0525983", "Ah, a new arrival! Welcome to Hammer Rest. While some focus on steel and stone, don\'t forget the importance of good cloth against the skin. I ensure our people are not only protected but also comfortable. A well-made shirt can be as vital as a shield on a cold watch night.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Artisan_Dunir_RoricStonewool_4_Response
